artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Kameya Iwakichi; Carver: Kobayashi Kintarō
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
dimension: 14 3/8 × 9 7/8 in. (36.51 × 25.08 cm) (image, sheet, each sheet, vertical ōban triptych)
life_date: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi, Japanese, 1839–1892; Kameya Iwakichi, Publisher; Kobayashi Kintarō, Carver
markings: Artist’s seal R, C: 芳桐 {Yoshikiri} | L: 彫工小金 {Horikō Kokin} | Censor seal: 申七改
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: R, C: 一魁斎芳年画 {Ikkaisai Yoshitoshi ga} | L: 玉桜芳年画 {Gyokuō Yoshitoshi ga}
text: Actors Ichikawa Ichizō III (R), Kawarazaki Gonjūrō I (C), and Nakamura Shikan IV.
title: Modern gallants with morning glories
